description: This file defines the SearchFragment class, a fragment responsible for handling search functionality in the app. It includes UI initialization, search result rendering, and interaction handlers for various item types such as VOD, programs, and favorites. Additionally, it defines related data classes and a RecyclerView adapter for displaying search result rows.

classes.name: SearchRow
classes.description: A sealed class representing different types of rows in the search results list, including headers, items, and an empty state.

subclasses.name: Header
subclasses.description: Represents a header row with a title.

subclasses.name: Empty
subclasses.description: Represents a row indicating no results.

classes.name: SearchAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView adapter for rendering various search result rows with appropriate view holders and handling user interactions.

classes.name: SimpleTextVH
classes.description: ViewHolder for simple text rows (headers and empty messages).

classes.name: VodRowVH
classes.description: ViewHolder for displaying VOD items, with actions for play and toggle favorite.

classes.name: ProgramRowVH
classes.description: ViewHolder for displaying program items, with actions for play and toggle favorite.

classes.name: FavoriteRowVH
classes.description: ViewHolder for displaying favorite items, mainly for informational display.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the fragment and retrieves the initial search query from arguments.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Sets up the RecyclerView, layout manager, and initiates the initial rendering.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Executes a search with the current query, builds the list of result rows, and sets up the RecyclerView adapter.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Static factory method to create a new instance of SearchFragment with a specified search query.
